name: Street Fighter Collection
description:
Street Fighter Collection is a bundle comprising several different games of the Street Fighter series. It includes:
  • Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers
  • Super Street Fighter II Turbo
  • Street Fighter Alpha 2 Gold (updated Street Fighter Alpha 2 with balancing fixes: Evil Ryu and Cammy added as playable characters, timing of some characters changed)

shot.caption: Title screen
Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers title screen
Super Street Fighter II X: Grand Master Challenge title screen (Japanese)
Street Fighter Zero 2' title screen (Japanese)
Character selection (Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers)
Character selection (Super Street Fighter II X: Grand Master Challenge)
Character selection (Street Fighter Zero 2')
Aiming to block successfully Ryu's Shakunetsu Hadouken, Fei Long starts to assume a guard position.
Cammy attacks with her Spiral Arrow move and Edmond Honda uses his Strong Punch to try stop her.
Blanka tries to use his Electric Thunder move in Dee Jay, but he strikes back with his Max Out...
A simultaneous-clashing-attack involving Ken Masters' Tatsumaki Senpuu Kyaku and Chun-Li's Kikouken.
Another simultaneous-clashing-attack, now involving Dhalsim's Yoga Flame and T. Hawk's Condor Dive.
Through the "simple" impact of a simple sweep, Ryu's possible counterattack is stopped by Zangief...
For a certain time, Thunder Hawk grabs Blanka and begins to smash him with successive elbow hits.
With a dizzied Zangief, Sagat gets the perfect time to use his Tiger Shot quickly and successfully!
Using one of his throw moves, Fei Long is about to end, once and for all, his battle against Cammy!
Guile's premise of attacking Thunder Hawk is suddenly interrupted by his Tomahawk Buster move...
The impact of Chun-Li's Spinning Bird Kick and E. Honda's aerial offensive went too much for both!
With some precision, Ryu gets the timing and uses successfully his Rushing Punch move in Zangief!
Aiming a counterattack, Blanka uses his move Surprise Forward and approaches a more little of Guile.
Simultaneous-clashing attacks: Zangief's Banishing Flat meets Edmond Honda's Hyakuretsu Harite...
Taking full advantage of his new Osoto Mawashi-geri move, Ken Masters attacks a crouched Dee Jay.
Now, Edmond Honda is about to butt-finish his new grabbing move Ooichou Nage in Thunder Hawk!
Dee Jay in a frustrated attempt of hitting Fei Long with his new move Maximum Jacknife.
Blanka avoids Sagat's Tiger Shot with the success of his avoid-attacking move Amazon River Run.
Chun-Li uses her Spinning Bird Kick move and stops temporarily M. Bison's (Balrog's) offensives...
Cammy tries to attack Balrog (Vega) with his Spin Drive Smasher Super Combo, but he escapes at time.
Cammy finishing her Cross Scissor Pressure (Hooligan Combination's complementary move) in Chun-Li.
Even before that Ken was able to attack, Dhalsim uses his Yoga Teleport move to take some advantage.
Sagat's scar shines for some instants: Angry Charge move activated! Beware his next Tiger Blow...
Rose meets Zangief's guard totally open and decides to attack him with a bloody-single Strong Kick.
Guard position OK: and Ken Masters is about to block Nash's (Charlie's) Sonic Break Super Combo...
Sakura gets the aerial advantage and Nash (Charlie) is damaged by her new move Sakura Otoshi.
A simultaneous-clashing-attack involving both Birdie's head-based move and Sodom's Jigoku Scrape.
Adon notices Dhalsim's open guard and unleashes the strength of his Jaguar Revolver Super Combo!
Vega (M. Bison) stunning Birdie through 2 "single"-successful hits of his Double Knee Press move.
Chun-Li's next battle starts now... And she begins using her Hyakuretsu Kyaku move in Dan Hibiki!
Evil Ryu using the Zero (Alpha) Counter command to "parry" Rolento's Mekong Delta Air Raid move.
Through her Spin Drive Smasher Super Combo, Cammy could inflict a superb-massive damage in Rose!
Both Shin Goukis (Akumas) are doing their introduction poses: a Gouki Mode match is about to start!
